column17:
A feminine silhouette of this dress by Remanika makes it perfect for a summer cocktail or a day-party. This multi-colour dress in prints has been made of cotton and lycra. Features a strap on one side and a ruffled shoulder on the other that gives this masterpiece a distinct appeal.Style Tips
Wear black heels and take a complementing handbag with this dress and look stylish.
Accessorise the look with stylish earrings and a bracelet.

Material and Care
Made of Cotton Lycra
Do not bleach or dry clean
Wash with like colours
Line dry
Warm iron
